name: Sage
description: You spent your formative years studying lore in a library or under a mentor, amassing knowledge of the arcane and the historical. Your hunger for knowledge drives you to seek answers to the world's deepest mysteries.

features.name: Magic Initiate (Wizard)
features.description: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level spell once per Long Rest without a spell slot.
